item.description:
Spicy Beer Night! February 9th -  $40


Sometimes, the menu simply calls for a cold beer, especially when spicy foods enter the equation. Big flavors that might be outmatched by even a robust red wine can pair perfectly with a bold ale or refreshing lager. Chili-heads rejoice: spices from around the world will be used to stoke a tasty fire that will be tempered only by an international selection of cold, craft beers. Don't miss out on this evening of spicy fare and ice cold brews - be forewarned, it will be a spicy night!

Dave's Fresh Pasta, 81 Holland Street, Davis Square, Somerville.
Secure your own space with credit card, non-refundable event. 617-623-0867
Limited to 35  Cross -post event

http://www.davesfreshpasta.com/
item.name: Spicy Beer Night! Spicy food and ice cold brews in Somerville
